title: EmuDeck for Windows
description: EmuDeck for Windows Beta is now available! Download it from emudeck.com

title: Pegasus Frontend
description: An old friend comes back from the EmuDeck origins, Pegasus Frontend. Uses the same artwork you already have downloaded for EmulationStation DE

title: Frontend Selector
description: EmulationStation DE, Pegasus, Steam? Chose your favourite frontend.

title: Theme Selector
description: Pick your favourite theme for Pegasus or EmulationStation DE when installing in Custom Mode.

title: Steam Rom Manager
description: We've completely redesigned the EmuDeck theme and added dynamic parsers, only the emulators you have installed will appear on SRM. We've also added an option to pick between RetroArch or Standalone emulator for some systems. This will be available in a few days as a SRM update

title: Refined UI
description: We've made some changes here and there to make the experience a bit better when installing Emulators. All the GUI has been customized per each OS EmuDeck will run on. Dark and light themes available.

title: Resolution Selector
description: Change your emulator resolution right within EmuDeck

title: Flycast
description: New emulator for Dreamcast and Naomi games

title: Early Access
description: Early Access users have exclusive access to features months before they are released, the upcoming Android and Mac ports of EmuDeck, CloudSync to have all your saved games sync between any EmuDeck installation, no matter if its Linux, Windows, Mac or OnionOS.. Windows users can also turn their handhelds into a SteamDeck with our BootMode

title: Better Linux support
description: The Install script will install all dependencies needed for Debian, Arch, Fedora, Suse and Void based distros.

title: ChimeraOS
description: New UI for ChimeraOS, and a new third party feature to add PowerControl to control the TDP on your Handheld

title: AutoSudo
description: If you don't have a sudo password set we will create a temporary for you so you can install Decky, Gyro and other stuff automatically. After that we will remove the temporary password.

title: EmuDecky
description: New Decky plugin to check hotkeys, toggle bezels, aspect ratios, etc. while in gaming mode. No need to go into Desktop mode
